channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Desktop

item.title: CVE-2021-42001|2024-08-04T03:22:25.903Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20desktop
item.description: PingID Desktop prior to 1.7.3 has a misconfiguration in the encryption libraries which can lead to sensitive data exposure. An attacker capable of exploiting this vulnerability may be able to successfully complete an MFA challenge via OTP.
